courses.title: Intro to Floristics
courses.description: An intro to Floristics course provides students with a comprehensive understanding of the fundamentals of floral design. Students learn about the different types of flowers and plants, their care, and advanced topics.

lessons.material: In this lesson, students will learn the basic concepts of floristics and its importance in the field of floral design.
This lesson covers the various types of flowers commonly used in floral arrangements, including their characteristics and symbolism.
Students will explore different techniques for creating stunning floral arrangements, including bouquet and centerpiece designs.

courses.title: Advanced Web Development
courses.description: This course dives deep into advanced topics of web development, including modern JavaScript frameworks, server-side rendering, and performance optimization. Ideal for students who want to take their web development skills to the next level.

courses.title: Graphic Design Essentials
courses.description: Graphic Design Essentials covers the core principles of graphic design, including typography, color theory, and layout techniques. Students will work on practical projects to develop a strong design portfolio.

courses.title: Introduction to Data Science
courses.description: This course introduces students to the field of data science, covering key concepts such as data manipulation, statistical analysis, and machine learning. Hands-on projects will help students apply these techniques to real-world data sets.

courses.title: Digital Marketing Strategies
courses.description: Learn the essential strategies of digital marketing, including SEO, content marketing, social media marketing, and PPC advertising. This course is designed to equip students with the skills needed to run successful digital marketing campaigns.

courses.title: Basics of Photography
courses.description: The Basics of Photography course teaches students about camera settings, composition, and lighting. Students will gain hands-on experience through various photography projects and assignments.

courses.title: Introduction to Python Programming
courses.description: This beginner-friendly course covers the basics of Python programming. Students will learn about variables, data types, control structures, functions, and more through interactive coding exercises.

courses.title: Project Management Fundamentals
courses.description: Project Management Fundamentals introduces students to key project management concepts and methodologies, including Agile, Scrum, and Waterfall. Students will learn how to plan, execute, and manage projects effectively.

courses.title: Creative Writing Workshop
courses.description: This course is designed for aspiring writers who want to improve their creative writing skills. Topics include narrative techniques, character development, and writing for different genres. Students will participate in writing exercises and peer reviews.

courses.title: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
courses.description: Explore the world of artificial intelligence in this introductory course. Topics include machine learning, neural networks, and natural language processing. Students will work on practical projects to build AI applications.
